text: * Adults with BMI > 40 with / without comorbidity * Adults with BMI 35 — 39.9 with at least one of the following: T2DM, OSA / OHS, Hypertension, Dysliplidaemia, NAFLD / NASH, GORD, Asthma, debilitating arthritis, disqualified for other surgery due to weight * Adults with BMI 30 — 34.9 with uncontrollable T2DM or Metabolic Syndrome
